Description:
Build our communications network, from product launches to thought leadership.
Manage relationships with PR agencies and external providers.
Secure repeatable and visible coverage across the media landscape, including print, online, broadcast, awards, and keynotes.
Create the right story telling content for brand perception. Measure and review brand perception and engagement.
Implement communication policies and safeguard the reputation of our brand.
Manage and develop spokespeople, including senior executives. Coordinate customer and partner stories for key moments and executive engagements.
Work closely with sales, engineering, marketing, communications and legal across the company as a trusted partner and advisor.
Create content and stories for our linkedin and website (articles, blogs, posts etc..)
Play a key role in building and managing the internal communications strategy while executing all employee communications programs, events and materials.
Effectively communicate the north star message to the team, and always have everyone’s vision set on that final goal.
Create innovative ways to communicate in a virtual/remote workplace that inform and motivate employees while keeping the company connected across all office locations
Manage all internal communications channels such as e-newsletters, in-office TV monitors, slack handle and more.
Coordinate and manage internal and external events, from team engagement activities to product exhibitions. 
Manage and grow our employee awards and recognition programs.
Prepare and write pitch decks and investment presentationsSkills
Skills:
4+ years of experience doing communications for a technology company
Strong writing and storytelling skills are a must, as is thriving in a fast-paced environment. Communication skills, both written and verbal need to be outstanding.
A creative mindset and a passion for communications.
Very strong attention to detail and the ability to juggle competing priorities.
Ability to be a self starter and a team player.
Ability to meet aggressive timelines across different departments.
Ability to see the Corporate-level perspective, the business group goals & objectives, and the fine details needed to implement complex communications.
You "have done it before" – you have built communications strategies.
Experience working with PR firms
Experience writing pitch decks
Tangible network of business and tech writers, and media connections within business, tech, and possibly education.
